items.title: Oxidizer.io
items.text: A unified commenting system for the internet. Built with: Node.js / Express for RESTfull API backend, React for frontend, Chrome Extension for Client, MySQL as Database and Redis as Session Store

items.title: Memoize
items.text: A memoize library with cache limitations governed by function call frequency or performance. Use it for algorithmic problems like fibonacci numbers in dynamic programming. Node and browser support.

items.title: Notes
items.text: A simple collaborative note taking app, built on Node, Angular, Bootstrap 3 & Passport.js.

items.title: R
items.text: A demo RESTful API returning (somewhat) random number between 0 and 1

items.title: Node.js Proof of Concept Virus
items.text: A proof of concept virus that attempts to infect other node applications. Um.. be careful with this.

items.title: Marketing Overlays
items.text: A third-party javascript library and PaaS for injecting marketing overlays in websites. Built with Node.js / Express, MongoDB, Angular JS and Jade

items.title: Feed.js
items.text: Utilizes Google Feed API to merge several RSS feeds into single display

items.title: Menu Concept
items.text: Reimplementation of a Codrops menu concept in jQuery

items.title: VideoCloud
items.text: MVP to explore a SoundCloud like platform for videos Built with Node.js / Express / Angular.js / MongoDB

items.title: U.S. Congress on Twitter
items.text: A small Node.js app that reads a public API and extracts all Twitter handles of Members of U.S. Congress to save the results into a CSV file.

items.title: Slideshow
items.text: A responsive slideshow, plug and play for your website

items.title: RegEx Challenge
items.text: A web app designed to help engineers master Regular Expressions with progress tracking. Tech Stack: Node.js / Express Backend, Passport JS & Google Oauth, ReactJS, Material UI and Bootstrap Frontend

items.title: Blog: Node.js Performance
items.text: An incomplete list of Node.js performance tips.

items.title: Blog: Node.js Configurations
items.text: Environmental dependend Node.js configuration, or: how NOT to accidentially commit / push your keys and secrets to GitHub.

items.title: Blog Collection: Rackspace
items.text: Blog posts on how to set up your LAMP or securing your RAX box by revoking root access via SSH, SCP and SFTP.
